mil3.3.4:1.2_0: “bhante nāgasena, atthi keci saṅkhārā, ye jāyantī”ti?
mil3.3.4:1.5_3: cakkhusamphasse sati vedanā hoti, vedanāya sati taṇhā hoti, taṇhāya sati upādānaṁ hoti, upādāne sati bhavo hoti, bhave sati jāti hoti,
mil3.3.4:1.6_1: asati rūpesu ca asati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ na hoti,
mil3.3.4:1.6_5: taṇhāya asati upādānaṁ na hoti, upādāne asati bhavo na hoti, bhave asati jāti na hoti,
mil3.3.4:1.6_6: jātiyā asati jarāmaraṇaṁ sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā na honti,
